pages.text: $(o)"When the Nothingness relinquished its grip from existence, one stood. He chose the path of unending dreams, as he knew, or at least thought to know, that nothing can exist, where Nothingness once was. And thus he fell asleep."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with the $(l:shaping/entry_drum)Empty Tympanum$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the aspect of $(marked)Emptiness$().

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: When upgraded to a statue, this statue will prove its origin when one dares to pray in front of it.
